fields.label: Title
fields.name: author_title
fields.instructions: A title for this author, e.g. "Director of [department]".

fields.label: Bio
fields.name: author_bio
fields.instructions:
A brief bio or description for this author.

This field must be set in order to display any author information (Author Name, Title, Bio, Photo) below post/statement content.

fields.label: Page Headline
fields.name: category_page_headline
fields.instructions: The H1 headline to be used for this category's page. Defaults to the category name + "News" (e.g. for a category named "Community" the default headline would be "Community News").

fields.label: Page Content Info
fields.message: By default, the category page's content consists of a single story displayed in the primary vertical layout at the top, followed by 9 posts displayed 3 per-row in the vertical layout. With the sidebar enabled, this content is displayed in a .col-lg-8. If the sidebar is disabled, the content will be displayed in a .col-12.

fields.label: Customize Page Content
fields.name: category_customize_page_content
fields.instructions: Turn on in order to customize this page's content.

fields.label: Custom Page Content
fields.name: category_custom_page_content
fields.instructions: Custom content for this category page.

fields.label: Enable Sidebar
fields.name: category_enable_sidebar
fields.instructions: Enables a sidebar on this category page with default sidebar content (UCF In The News, Events at UCF, Resources menu). Options are also available below to customize sidebar contents.

fields.label: Customize Sidebar
fields.name: category_customize_sidebar
fields.instructions: Turn on in order to customize the content and sections in the sidebar.

fields.label: What type of content should be displayed on the homepage?
fields.name: page_content_type

fields.label: Curated List Expiration
fields.name: curated_list_expiration
fields.instructions:
Specify how long this curated list should remain on the homepage. Leave blank to use this curated list indefinitely.
When a curated list expires, the homepage will revert to a list of latest stories.

fields.label: Primary Content
fields.name: primary_content
fields.instructions: Content block that appears full width above the two column layout when the sidebar is enabled. Place the primary story here.

sub_fields.label: Custom Content
sub_fields.name: custom_content
sub_fields.instructions: Specify arbitrary, custom content to add to this row.

fields.label: Promote on Main Site
fields.name: post_main_site_story
fields.instructions: When checked, the story will appear in the news feed on UCF.edu.

fields.label: Header Content - Type of Content
fields.name: page_header_content_type
fields.instructions: Specify the type of content that should be displayed within the header.  Choose "Title and subtitle" to display a styled page title and optional subtitle, or choose "Custom content" to add any arbitrary content.  If "Custom content" is selected, a page title and subtitle are NOT included by default and should be added manually.

fields.label: Header Title Text
fields.name: page_header_title
fields.instructions: Overrides the page title.

fields.label: Page h1
fields.name: page_header_h1
fields.instructions: Specify which part of the page title to use as the h1 for the page.  Styling of the title/subtitle will not be affected by this choice.

fields.label: Include Subnavigation
fields.name: page_header_include_subnav
fields.instructions: Enable this setting to display an affixed subnavigation bar below the page header.  Requires the Automatic Sections Menu plugin to be activated, and for at least one section within the page's content to be configured to appear in the navbar.

fields.label: Original Publish Date
fields.name: post_header_publish_date
fields.instructions: The date the post was originally published. Changing the 'Published on' date above will update the dates listed in the story’s header and bump this story to the top of lists where it's referenced.

fields.label: Deck
fields.name: post_header_deck
fields.instructions: Appears below the title on a single post.  Is also used as excerpt text within lists of posts.

fields.label: Header Media Type
fields.name: header_media_type
fields.instructions: Select the type of header for this story.

fields.label: Header Video
fields.name: post_header_video_url
fields.instructions: Paste in a video URL from YouTube, Vimeo, etc. to display in place of a header image.

fields.label: Header/Thumbnail Image
fields.name: post_header_image
fields.instructions:
Select or upload an image with dimensions of 1200x800 for this story. The image file size must be less than 800KB.

When the "Header Media Type" value is set to "Image", this image will be used as the header image on the story, as well as the thumbnail image when this story is displayed in lists of stories.

When the "Header Media Type" value is set to "Video", if an image is provided, the image will be used as the thumbnail when this story is displayed in lists of stories. If no image is provided, WordPress will attempt to fetch and use a poster image dynamically based on the "Header Video" URL provided.

fields.label: Author Type
fields.name: post_author_type
fields.instructions: Choose whether to reference an existing Author's information, or define one-off custom information for this post.

fields.label: Author Byline
fields.name: post_author_byline
fields.instructions: Appears in place of post author's name.

fields.label: Author Title
fields.name: post_author_title
fields.instructions: Appears under the author's name/byline below the story's content, only if the Author Bio is set.

fields.label: Author Photo
fields.name: post_author_photo
fields.instructions: Appears below the story's content.

fields.label: Author Bio
fields.name: post_author_bio
fields.instructions:
Appears below the story's content.

This field must be set in order to display any author information (Author Name, Title, Bio, Photo) below the story's content.

fields.label: Existing Author
fields.name: post_author_term
fields.instructions: Choose an existing Author to assign to this post.  Name, title, photo and bio information will be referenced from the Author that's selected.

fields.label: Primary Tag
fields.name: post_primary_tag
fields.instructions: Select the primary tag that will be used to populate the Related Stories section.

fields.label: Source
fields.name: post_source
fields.instructions: Appears below the story content (and below the Author Bio if set).

fields.label: Display Tag Cloud
fields.name: post_display_tag_cloud
fields.instructions: Display a tag cloud under the post's content or source. Defaults to true.

fields.label: Tag Cloud Count
fields.name: post_tag_cloud_count
fields.instructions: The number of tags to show in the tag cloud. Defaults to 5.

fields.label: Link Description
fields.name: ucf_resource_link_description
fields.instructions: A brief summary of the content being linked to.

fields.label: Enable Sidebar
fields.name: enable_sidebar
fields.instructions: Enables a sidebar on this page with customizable drag-and-drop contents.

sub_fields.label: Feed URL
sub_fields.name: events_feed_url
sub_fields.instructions: UCF Events feed URL. Defaults to the "UCF Events JSON Feed URL" value in the UCF Events plugin.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: events_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Layout that will be used for displaying the events. Defaults to classic.

sub_fields.label: Number of Posts
sub_fields.name: events_number_of_posts
sub_fields.instructions: The number of events to be displayed. Defaults to 4.

sub_fields.label: 'View All' Link
sub_fields.name: events_view_all_link
sub_fields.instructions: The URL assigned to the 'View All Events' link. Defaults to a front-end view URL based on the "UCF Events JSON Feed URL" value in the UCF Events plugin.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: news_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Layout that will be used to display the news stories. Defaults to condensed.

sub_fields.label: Number of Posts
sub_fields.name: news_number_of_posts
sub_fields.instructions: The number of news stories to be displayed. Defaults to 4.

sub_fields.label: Resources Menu
sub_fields.name: resources_menu
sub_fields.instructions: Select the menu to be displayed. Can be verified by checking the Appearance > Menus page. Defaults to 'Resources'.

sub_fields.label: Select Spotlight
sub_fields.name: spotlight_object
sub_fields.instructions: Select a spotlight to display in the sidebar.

sub_fields.label: Custom Content
sub_fields.name: custom_content
sub_fields.instructions: Insert custom content to display in the sidebar.

fields.label: Author
fields.name: post_author_term
fields.instructions: Choose an existing Author to assign to this Statement.  Name, title, photo and bio information will be referenced from the Author that's selected.
